name: Create An FMV Game Demo
description:
Complete Build-Your-Own Interactive Movie Toolkit

Create your own Interactive Movie with NO CODE! No videos? No problem! This course incudes almost 100mb of video and animation content to learn with. Learn the basics in just a few hours in this step-by-step walkthrough!

Click above to play the demo.

Go here for information about the course!
https://gamedesigngriot.thinkific.com/courses/fmv
